article_title: Authorities Investigate Cause Of Midwest City House Fire - News9.com - Oklahoma City, OK - News, Weather, Video and Sports
article_text:
Authorities are investigating the cause of a house fire Monday morning in Midwest City.

According to the Midwest City Fire Department, firefighters responded to the fire at a home in the 10000 block of Oak Park Drive. When they arrived, the fire was fully-involved.

Crews were able to bring the fire under control. No one was home at the time, and no injuries were reported.

Officials are looking into the cause of the fire.

article_summary:
Authorities are investigating the cause of a house fire Monday morning in Midwest City.
According to the Midwest City Fire Department, firefighters responded to the fire at a home in the 10000 block of Oak Park Drive.
Officials are looking into the cause of the fire.
No one was home at the time, and no injuries were reported.
Crews were able to bring the fire under control.
